name: Shield Block
description:
The next time this character acts, they will immediately use the Skill Shield Slice.
While preparing Shield Slice: Grant 2 Shield points to this character.
descriptionraw: The next time this character acts, they will immediately use the Skill <color=#FFFFFFFF>$[S34085]</color>.\n<color=#FFFFFFFF>While preparing $[S34085]:</color> Grant 2 $[K6] points to this character.
descriptionreplaced: The next time this character acts, they will immediately use the Skill <color=#FFFFFFFF>Shield Slice</color>.\n<color=#FFFFFFFF>While preparing Shield Slice:</color> Grant 2 {SPRITE_PRESET#4007}<color=#FFFFFFFF>Shield</color> points to this character.
